sentences.en: Armor plate is impenetrable by ordinary bullets.
sentences.cn: 装甲板普通子弹打不穿.

sentences.en: Astronomers have breached the powerful armor of the earth's atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 天文学家摆脱了地球大气的严重束缚.

sentences.en: He has been disencumbered of his armor.
He merely wore breast armor and carried a keen blade.
sentences.cn: 在他的旗上写着四个大字“先锋黄盖”.

sentences.en: Love songs trick us into believing in knights in shining armor.
sentences.cn: 情歌哄骗我们去相信有勇救美人的英雄。

sentences.en: Q: Where do I get trained to wear power armor?
sentences.cn: 问: 我在哪里可以得到培训来穿动力装甲?

sentences.en: Sandy knows that joy is an armor of self - protection.
sentences.cn: 珊蒂知道,喜悦就是 自我 保护的甲胄.

sentences.en: See why this sIob needs to wear body armor.
sentences.cn: 明白为什么这个软蛋需要穿上护甲了吧?

sentences.en: She was encased in Athenian armor, safe from emotional injury.
sentences.cn: 她穿戴着雅典娜的盔甲, 这样她就不会受到感情上的伤害.

sentences.en: The knight was completely clad in armor.
sentences.cn: 那位骑士全身披挂盔甲.

sentences.en: The leading role in the film is costumed in medieval armor.
sentences.cn: 影片中的主角穿着中古时代的甲胄。

sentences.en: The troops and armor were massed along the border.
sentences.cn: 部队和装甲兵集结在边境上.

sentences.en: Their feathers were like armor impenetrable to steel.
sentences.cn: 它们的羽毛就象刀剑穿不透的盔甲.

sentences.en: There had been no crack in Tynan's armour armor.
sentences.cn: 从泰纳恩身上找不出什么破绽.

sentences.en: This Courtly Poetry came out of the idea of chivalry and courtly love that you might associate with knights in shining armor.
sentences.cn: 这首宫廷诗取材于骑士精神和典雅爱恋，你可能会想到这与身穿闪光的盔甲的骑士有关。

words.tran_cn: 武装的；有扶手的；有防卫器官的（指动物）
